description:
Get away from it all and immerse yourself in nature. With an anatomic footbed and Alpitex waterproof membrane these boots will take you as far as your imagination can go. Give your feet what they deserve with a medium flex and Thinsulate insulation that offer all-day warmth and comfort.

  • Made of leather with an Alpitex waterproof-breathable membrane
  • Thinsulate insulation adds warmth without excess bulk
  • Simple lace-up closures with top lace hooks
  • Protective toebox with a rubber rand
  • Padded collar for comfort and warmth
  • Anatomic footbeds
  • Vibram rubber sole
  • Compatible with NNN BC bindings
name: Alpina Alaska Backcountry Touring Boots - Unisex
